name: DevOps Training Session
tagline: GitHub, Jenkins, Artifactory, AgentSmith, Curl, CI&CD
body:
### DevOps Training Session - DevOps is a set of practices that combines software development (Dev) and IT operations (Ops). It aims to shorten the systems development life cycle and provide continuous delivery with high software quality. - DevOps is complementary with Agile software development; several DevOps aspects came from Agile methodology. ### Toolchains |Concept | Description | | ------------ | ------------ | | Coding |code development and review, source code management tools, code merging. | | Building | continuous integration tools, build status. | | Testing | continuous testing tools that provide quick and timely feedback on business risks. | | Packaging | artifact repository, application pre-deployment staging. | | Releasing | change management, release approvals, release automation. | | Configuring | infrastructure configuration and management, infrastructure as code tools. | | Monitoring | applications performance monitoring, end-user experience. | ### AgileDevOps ![AgileDevOps](/images/agileDevops.jpg "This is a AgileDevOps image.") [![](https://mermaid.ink/img/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ2FudHRcbiAgICB0aXRsZSBEZXZPcHMgVHJhaW5pbmcgU2Vzc2lvbiBEYXl3aXNlXG4gICAgZGF0ZUZvcm1hdCBZWVlZLU1NLUREXG4gICAgc2VjdGlvbiBEYXkxPGJyPkRldk9wJ3M8YnI-NGhyc1xuICAgIERldm9wcyAgICAgICAgICA6YTEsIDIwMjAtMTAtMDUsIDFoXG4gICAgVmVyc2lvblRvb2wgICAgIDphMSwgMjAyMC0xMC0wNSwgMmhcbiAgICBzZWN0aW9uIERheTI8YnI--)](https://mermaid-js.github.io/mermaid-live-editor/#/edit/eyJjb2RlIjoiZ2FudHRcbiAgICB0aXRsZSBEZXZPcHMgVHJhaW5pbmcgU2Vzc2lvbiBEYXl3aXNlXG4gICAgZGF0ZUZvcm1hdCBZWVlZLU1NLUREXG4gICAgc2VjdGlvbiBEYXkxPGJyPkRldk9wJ3M8YnI-NGhyc1xuICAgIERldm9wcyAgICAgICAgICA6YTEsIDIwMjAtMTAtMDUsIDFoXG4gICAgVmVyc2lvblRvb2wgICAgIDphMSwgMjAyMC0xMC0wNSwgMmhcbiAgICBzZWN0aW9uIERheTI8YnI--) ###DevOps Daywise Plan | Day | First Half | Second Half | | ------------ | ------------ | ------------ | | 1 | DevOps Methodology
DevOps Lifecycle
DevOps Architecture
Devops Toolchains -Discussion | Github-Overview
Github- Code Commit
Github-issues,wiki,tags, Release
New Features of Github action & seucrity (not aviabale in allstate repo's) | | 2 | Jenkins-Overview
Jenkins-Jobs
Jenkins-features
Jenkins-freestyle
Jekins-pipeline | Pipeline Creation using Groovy | | 3 | SonarQube
Artifactory
AgentSmith | Deployment in Server's - Overview | | 4 | Scope of Automation in the projects | basic automation tools -curl,Cron,external trigger etc
Q&A |
